3077: An invalid location code was passed. Either this was a typo of a valid code, or an incorrect argument entirely.
1001: This most likely means that an incorrectly named folder exists at the ID level.
1028: The regex pattern specified in the config cannot be parsed. The default will be used instead.
4289: The config file specified in the JOHNNYBGOODE_CONFIG_FILE variable does not exist or cannot be accessed.
4293: The config file does not exist or cannot be accessed.
4271: The top level directory specified in the config does not exist or cannot be accessed.
